altTitles.th: เกาะกระหายเลือด ฝ่า 48 วันโลกวิกฤต

description.en: The human army lost the battle against the vampires on Higanjima Island. Unable to prevent Miyabi's plan, Japan has become a vampire country. Six months later, there is a one-armed man fighting the vampires in abandoned Japan! The man's name is Akira Miyamoto. A warrior who has already tasted hell on Higanjima.

title.en: My New Girlfriend Is Not Human?

altTitles.de: Meine neue Freundin ist kein Mensch?

altTitles.fr: Ma Nouvelle Copine N'est Pas Humaine ?

altTitles.pt-br: Minha nova namorada não é humana?

altTitles.tr: Yeni kız arkadaşım insan değil mi?

altTitles.pl: Moja nowa dziewczyna nie jest człowiekiem?

description.en: Third part of the Gunnm series after GUNNM and GUNNM Last Order.

title.en: I'm an Elite Angel, but I'm Troubled by an Impregnable JK!

altTitles.ja: 私、エリート天使ですが難攻不落なJKに困ってます！

altTitles.en: I'm an Elite Angel, but I'm Troubled by an Impregnable High School Girl!

altTitles.ja-ro: Watashi, Elite Tenshi desu ga Nankoufuraku na JK ni Komattemasu!

description.en: The role of angels is to evaluate the good deeds performed by humans and grant them "small wishes" in return. Ariel is one of these angels. However, what appeared in front of her was a high school girl who didn't have a "small wish" despite having performed over 10,000 good deeds. Ariel tries to approach this high school girl, and then… Angel (♀) × JK (♀) a somewhat naughtly slapstick romantic comedy ♡
description.ja:
天使たちの役目は、人間の善行を評価し、その善行にあった「小さな願い」を叶えること。天使・アリエルもその役目を担う一人であった。しかし、目の前に現れたのは、数万もの善行を重ねているにも関わらず「小さな願い」のひとつも見えない女子高生で？

接触を試みるアリエルに、迫るＪＫ……
「わたしと、シてみる？」――――――――!?!?

description.en: In a world where special powers awaken in individuals, a 4-year-old boy becomes an S-class hunter but has no parents. Assigned a quest to find guardians, he is eventually adopted by the nation’s top hunter. With a new skill that allows him to register caregivers and earn "devotion points" for growth, he sets out to gather the best guardians to grow stronger and thrive.

Xia Yuxin's presence at school never fails to draw attention. She has a mature beauty about her, always poised, and exuding confidence in class. Being admired so much by her classmates, one would think she's a well-respected senior but in truth, it might be because she's a repeat student. Xia Yuxin has more to her elegant facade.


---

**Links:**
- [Alternative official English](https://www.webcomicsapp.com/comic/Lala/5c0a4df8d5626e75ff1f2d11)
description.pt-br:
Xia Yu Xun é uma estudante que por ter faltado em uma prova, teve que repetir um ano. Para todos os seus colegas de classe que são um ano menor que ela, Xia Yu Xun é uma Xue Jie (senpai, veterana) genial, alta, decidida, muito bela e muito “cool”. Claro que ela não pensa assim, adoraria ser mais baixa pois assim conseguiria usar roupas mais bonitas. Sua obsessão é tanta que desenha suas próprias criações, com intenção de algum dia surgir alguém com o “estilo” dos seus sonhos. Na escola acaba encontrando uma pessoa adequada para isso, mas fazer amizade com ela vai ser um pouco difícil…


---

**Links:**
- [Alternative official English](https://www.webcomicsapp.com/comic/5c0a4df8d5626e75ff1f2d11)

altTitles.ja: ヒミツのヒロコちゃん

description.en:
I've always loved you. That's why whether in sickness or in heath, I want to walk beside you...

I went to Hanafuu University, a different school than my best friend, Aiko. I'm sad to be separated from Aiko, but I thought I would be fine if I can be with my lover, Ritsu... but he's been busy with the opening of his second store, and we can hardly meet. I don't want to bother him, so I pretend to be mature and behave myself, but it seems like I've made a mistake...?!

title.en: Power-Hara Genkai Yuusha, Maougun kara Koutaiguu de Scout sareru ~Yuusha Ranking 1-i na no ni Tedori ga Gomi sugite Seikatsu Dekimasen~

altTitles.ja: パワハラ限界勇者、魔王軍から好待遇でスカウトされる～勇者ランキング１位なのに手取りがゴミ過ぎて生活できません～

description.en:
In this modern age, there are many heroes and demon lords. There was a hero who ranked first in the hero rankings and had the title of "Strongest''. His name is Hero Allen. The strongest hero, who is recognized by everyone, has gained status and honor, and his life is in easy mode...

"That never happened!"

Orders to subjugate the Demon King are issued without a break. Even if you go to great lengths to subjugate a brutal demon lord, you will only receive an amount that even an average man can easily earn, excluding miscellaneous expenses. All expeditions are at my own expense. It's not very bad, but I can't live with it. He then confronts the demon king of destiny. The beautiful female demon lord made a proposal to the dissatisfied hero.

"Hero! Get hired on these conditions!"

The conditions were so favorable, that I was moved.
description.ja:
無数の勇者と魔王が存在する世界で、『最強』の称号を持つ勇者アレン。だが彼は、悩んでいた…
・絶え間ない魔王討伐命令
・王様からのパワハラ
・見合わない報酬

もう、我慢の限界!!

そんな金欠勇者に魔王から救いの手が!? 超好待遇のスカウトにアレンの選択は――

description.en: 100 Short Manga about Types of and Behavior in Yuri Relationships

Taiki Inomata is on the boys' badminton team at sports powerhouse Eimei Junior and Senior High. He's in love with basketball player Chinatsu Kano, the older girl he trains alongside every morning in the gym. One Spring day, their relationship takes a sharp turn ... And thus begins this brand-new series of love, sports and youth!

---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media (2023)
description.fr:
Taiki Inomata, membre du club de badminton, a eu le coup de foudre pour Chinatsu Kano, la star du club de basket de son établissement. Il s'entraîne à ses côtés tous les matins. Sa relation avec Chinatsu va prendre un tournant totalement inédit lorsqu'un jour de printemps, une nouvelle des plus déconcertantes va lui offrir une opportunité inespérée de conquérir sa belle.

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Delcourt/Tonkam**
description.ja: バドミントン部に所属する猪股大喜（いのまたたいき）は、女子バスケ部の先輩・鹿野千夏（かのちなつ）に恋をしていた――。自主練を真摯に取り組む姿に心惹かれていたが、思いもよらぬ事実が発覚し…!?　道のりは遠く、想いは近く。
description.kk: Тайки Иномата - спортқа терең бағытталған Еймей орта және жоғары мектебінің бадминтон тобында ойнайды. Ол әр таң сайын мектеп спортзалында онымен бірге жаттығатын Чинацу Кано атты үздік баскетболшы сенпайға ғашық. Бір күні олардың қарым - қатынасы өзгеріске ұшырап, арасындағы қашықтық жойыла бастады... Осылай, көктемнің бір кезінде мектеп спорт залында тағы да бір махаббат, спорт және жастық шақ оқиғасы басталды.
description.tl: Si Taiki Inomata ay nasa boys' badminton team na sports powerhouse ng Eimei Junior at Senior High. In love siya sa basketball player na si Chinatsu Kano, ang babaeng mas matanda sa kaniya na kasama niya magpraktis kada umaga sa gym. Isang araw, ang kanilang relasyon ay biglang nagbago.
description.uk:
Тайкі Іномата — учасник команди з бадмінтону, який вчиться у школі Еймей. Щодня він намагається прийти до школи якомога раніше, але його завжди випереджає Чінацу Кано, в яку він закоханий.

Чінацу — зірка команди з баскетболу. Хоч Тайкі добре грає в бадмінтон, він далеко не настільки популярний, як Чінацу, що робить шанси на взаємну симпатію низькими. Але за дивним поворотом долі Чінацу починає жити в його будинку.
description.vi:
Taiki Inomata, năm ba sơ trung, là thành viên của đội cầu lông. Kể từ khi tập luyện cùng với đội cầu lông, cậu luôn cố đến sớm nhất có thể, thế nhưng, cậu chỉ là người thứ hai đến nhà đa năng. Bởi vì người đầu tiên luôn đến sớm nhất, chính là Chinatsu Kano, năm nhất cao trung, và là người mà cậu thích.

Vì sự chênh lệch giữa mức độ nổi tiếng mà cậu cảm thấy mình không thể kéo gần khoảng cách với cô ấy. Thế nhưng...

Vào một ngày đẹp trời, vì chuyện gia đình, Chinatsu Kano đã đến sống chung với Taiki Inomata.

Với cơ hội ngàn năm có một này, với cái flag romcom to hơn núi Phú Sĩ này, liệu rằng cậu chàng Taiki có thể làm nên chuyện hay không?
description.es-la: Taiki Inomata forma parte del equipo masculino de bádminton en el prestigioso instituto deportivo Eimei Junior y Senior High. Su corazón late por Chinatsu Kano, la hábil jugadora de baloncesto con la que comparte entrenamientos matutinos en el gimnasio. En un día primaveral, su relación da un giro sorprendente… Y así se inicia esta nueva serie que combina amor, deportes y la efervescencia de la juventud.
description.pt-br: Taiki Inomata está na equipe de Badminton dos meninos na Powerhouse Esportiva Eimei Junior e Senior High. Ele está apaixonado por jogador de basquete Chinatsu Kano, a menina mais velha que ele treina ao lado de todas as manhãs no ginásio. Um dia de primavera, seu relacionamento tem uma virada acentuada ... e assim começa esta nova série de amor, esportes e jovens!

description.en: Am I "necessary" in this world? What is the true nature of the person called "Mujina" who flies in the sky with a sword on her back in the midst of ordinary life? What is man, what is society, what are human rights, and what is happiness?
description.es: ¿Soy "necesario" en este mundo? ¿Cuál es la verdadera naturaleza de la persona llamada "Mujina" que vuela por el cielo con una espada a cuestas en medio de la vida ordinaria...? ¿Qué es el hombre, la sociedad, los derechos humanos y la felicidad...?
description.ja: この世界に、私は”必要”かーー！？何気ない日常の中、刀を背に空を翔ぶ「ムジナ」と呼ばれる者の実体とは…？人間とは、社会とは、人権とは、そして幸せとは…
description.ru: История о юной девушке-убийце с катаной, которая охотится за своими целями в оживлённом столичном городе Цукумо.
description.es-la: ¿Soy "necesario" en este mundo? ¿Cuál es la verdadera naturaleza de la persona llamada "Mujina" que vuela por el cielo con una espada a cuestas en medio de la vida ordinaria...? ¿Qué es el hombre, la sociedad, los derechos humanos y la felicidad...?

altTitles.ja: 雪解けとアガパンサス

description.en: Natsuki, the prince of an all-girls school meets an innocent (girl) transfer student, Shun, who doesn't treat Natsuki like a prince, but instead treats her as a "friend." Natsuki excels in everything she does and even has a fan club at school. Even though she was looked at with admiration, her days were somehow unfulfilled... Although Natsuki feels uncomfortable with her first "friend", Shun's innocent smile and bright personality make Natsuki's heart flutter...?
description.ja: 文武両道でファンクラブまで存在する女子校の王子(プリンス)、夏月(なつき)。憧憬の眼差しを受けながらも、何だか満たされない日々を送っていた……。そんな彼女のもとに、転校生の春(しゅん)がやって来る。今までの生徒たちとは違い、夏月を王子様扱いせず、「友達」として接する春。夏月は初めての「友達」に違和感を抱きながらも、その無邪気な笑顔と明るい性格に心がときめいていき…？

description.en:
"I’m... back!"

After a comet collides on Earth, a gaming world filled with monsters and dungeons becomes a reality. Amidst the chaos, Gong Won-Ho wakes up as Hardcore Leveling Warrior, an almighty game character with exceptional luck and power.

Once again, he will embark on a journey to become the strongest... but this time, on Earth!

The original story which the popular manga series Horimiya is based on.  
  
It's said that youth is bittersweet, but maybe it's just bitter? Kyoko Hori is a flashy high school girl, who, despite her ostentatious appearance, excels in academics and loves her family. Izumi Miyamura is a bland high school boy, who, regardless of not wanting to stand out in class, secretly wears piercings outside of school and has a large body tattoo. One day, Miyamura finds Hori's little brother injured and helps him back to Hori's house, where the relationship between Hori and Miyamura begins with Hori's discovery of Miyamura's secret, and his of her's.  
  


---
description.ru:
В школе Хори-сан – пример для всех – красивая, дружелюбная девушка с высокой успеваемостью, но это лишь одна её сторона, другую – она тщательно скрывает. Её родителей-трудоголиков часто не бывает дома, так что Хори вынуждена всё своё свободное время посвящать домашним делам и присмотру за младшим братом.  
Миямура-кун кажется одноклассникам мрачным отаку в очках, однако на самом деле он очень вежливый и спокойный человек, и ему трудно даётся учёба. Миямура не любит выделяться, так что усердно скрывает, что у него есть пирсинг и татуировки.  
Однажды случай сводит их вместе за пределами школы. Хори едва узнаёт в нём своего одноклассника, а Миямура поражён тем, насколько она отличается от того образа, что поддерживает в школе. Теперь им двоим есть с кем поделиться своими тайнами и раскрыть настоящих себя.  
  


---

Chapters 1 - 140 are the main story.  
Chapters 141 onwards are extras.

title.en: Abandoned ~Tsuyosugite Buki ga Kowareru Yuusha to Buki Shokunin no Elf~

altTitles.ja: アバンダンド〜強すぎて武器が壊れる勇者と武器職人のエルフ〜

altTitles.en: Abandoned: The Hero Who's So Strong He Breaks Every Weapon, and the Elf Weaponsmith

altTitles.tr: Terk edilmiş: Her Silahı Kıracak Kadar Güçlü Kahraman ve Elf Silah Ustası

description.en: An elf weaponsmith meets a hero who's so strong every weapon shatters in his hands after a single use.

Millions of years have passed since the times of legends, when the worlds of man and gods were still the same. In these times it was the desires of man that moved the world. It is the era of the 500 year war: The warring states period. Kingdom is the story of a young boy named Shin who grew into a great general and all the trials and bloodshed that lead him there.  

---
  
- **Won the Osamu Tezuka Cultural Grand Prize in 2013**
- **Earned a Guinness World Record on December 12, 2012 for Manga written by the most people. -Note- The record was due to its "Social Kingdom" campaign in which fans and other artists were given the task of redrawing the entire 26th volume.**

As of June 2022, Kingdom has over 90 million copies in circulation, making it one of the currently best-selling manga series of all time. 

Parution: Weekly Young Jump

---

**Officially Translated:**  
- In French by [Meian](https://www.meian-editions.fr/meian/licence/kingdom/1131)  
- In Italian by [J-pop](https://j-pop.it/it/fumetti/manga/kingdom.html)
description.fr:
**Cette Histoire se déroule avant notre ère.**

La chine, qui n'est pas encore unifiée, traverse une grande guerre de cinq siècles. Shin, un jeune garçon contemporain de ces temps violents et houleux, cherche, par la seule force de son épée, à se faire un nom sous les cieux !!!
___
**Kingdom en France, le manga tant attendu ! Véritable phénomène au Japon !**
- Élu meilleur manga au 17e Grand Prix Culturel Osamu Tezuka (2013)
- Meilleur manga seinen vendu au Japon depuis 2015 (source : Oricon)
- 3ème meilleur manga vendu au Japon en 2016 et 2017 (source : Oricon)
description.uk: Мільйони років минуло з часів легенд, коли світ людей і богів був єдиним. У ті часи бажання людини верховодило над світом. Це була епоха 500-річної війни, період ворожих держав. «Королівство» — історія про хлопчину на ім’я Сінь, котрий прагне стати найвеличнішим генералом та про безліч випробувань та скитань, повз які пролягатиме його шлях до мети.
description.pt-br: Milhões de anos se passaram desde os tempos de lendas, quando os mundos dos homens e deuses ainda eram os mesmos. Nestes tempos eram os desejos do homem que mudaram o mundo. É o período da guerra de 500 anos: a Era dos Reinos Combatentes. Kingdom é a história de um garoto órfão e pobre tem o sonho de se tornar um grande general e assim começando seu caminho de provações e derramamento de sangue que o levarão até o topo das lendas!

title.en: Touhou Suichouka ~ Lotus Eater-tachi no Suisei

altTitles.en: The Lotus Eaters, Drunk and Sober
Touhou Drunken Butterfly Flower ~ Lotus Eaters' Sobering

altTitles.ja: 東方酔蝶華　ロータスイーター達の酔醒

altTitles.pt-br: Touhou: Flor de Borboleta Bêbada ~ Comedores de Lotus, Bêbados e Sóbrios
Flor de Borboleta Bêbada Oriental ~ Os Bêbados e Sóbrios Comedores de Lotus

description.en: In this sixth official Touhou manga series from ZUN, the shrine maiden Reimu Hakurei goes to investigate a strange rumor in the human village, where she gets involved with the local Geidontei bar and its poster girl, Miyoi Okunoda.
description.ja: 幻想郷の人里にある居酒屋「鯢呑亭（げいどんてい）」には、最近、飲んだ帰りの客が妖怪にさらわれて失踪するという噂が。博麗神社の巫女・霊夢はこの疑惑の調査に乗り出す。どうやらカギは看板娘の美宵のようで…？
description.es-la:
En la aldea humana de Gensokyo, un rumor sobre un youkai que supuestamente secuestra a personas alcoholizadas se extiende de forma repentina con gran rapidez, causando miedo y preocupación entre la gente. Mientras tanto, en el centro de este rumor, el bar izakaya Geidontei, no hay nada fuera de lugar en lo que respecta a su comida y bebida, o incluso con respecto a su propietario.

Cuando la sacerdotisa Reimu Hakurei se entera de la situación, intenta cumplir con su deber de investigar el sospechoso establecimiento. Sin embargo, el caso la lleva a otra persona: Miyoi Okunoda, cuya existencia parece ser tan volátil como una burbuja.
description.pt-br:
Uma estranha história sobre álcool. O mais novo mangá oficial de "Touhou", escrito por ZUN.   
  
Existe um rumor de que em um bar chamado "Geidontei", localizado em uma área remota de Gensokyo, um cliente bêbado foi sequestrado por um youkai. Reimu, sacerdotisa do Santuário Hakurei, embarca em uma investigação, mas aparentemente, a chave para desvendar o caso está na garçonete da loja…?

altTitles.ja: 転生前はドラゴンでした

altTitles.en: Before Reincarnation I Was A Dragon

description.en: The hero and the dragon defeated the Demon King, saving the world, but they died. Then they were reincarnated in another world (Japan)... This is their story.

title.en: My Food Seems to Be Very Cute

altTitles.zh: 我的食物看起来很可爱

altTitles.zh-ro: Wǒ de shíwù kàn qǐlái hěn kě'ài

altTitles.zh-hk: 我的食物看起來很可愛

description.en: A vampire who has been sleeping for nearly two hundred years, Maria is awakened by a passing werewolf girl by a chance, and the moment the coffin is opened, the curse falls on the werewolf girl. The two girls set foot on the journey to the city
description.es-la: Maria, una vampiro que había estado durmiendo por casi doscientos años, es despertada por Xing Lan, una chica lobo que pasaba por ahí. Cuando el ataúd se abre, una maldición cae sobre Xing Lan. Sin embargo, en lugar de asustarse, la inocente Xing Lan cree haber encontrado una excelente compañera, y ambas embarcan juntas un viaje a la ciudad. Así comienza su historia.

altTitles.en: Would you be kind enough to 𝓽𝓪𝓹 me?!

altTitles.ja: 私とセイコウしませんか!?

description.en:
The only man she interacts with is her editor...

Ito Omura, a 26-year-old manga artist with zero dating experience (her age = years without a boyfriend).

In order to succeed, she decides:
"I need to graduate from being a virgin!"

Penetrate the Hymen! Break the Chastity!
The comedy of a clumsy and perverted heroine’s sexual growth begins!
description.ja: 関わる異性は担当編集だけ……彼氏いない歴＝年齢の26歳漫画家・大村糸。成功するために、「そうだ、処女を捨てよう――。」穿て処女膜！押し売れ貞操‼ポンコツ変態ヒロインの“性”長コメディ開幕！

title.en: Anata to Watashi no Kankei wa?

description.en:
Yuka, 28 years old and without a boyfriend, decides to participate in the group date. 
But what she meets there is a math teacher she had a crush on in high school...! The two become drinking buddies and meet more and more often, until one day they get drunk and end up spending the night at a hotel.  *"Ten years have passed, and I've grown up... but I'm liking him more and more... is it because I'm his former student? Or...?"*

title.en: Astro King - Shoukan Yuusha dakedo Kakyuu Nintei sareta node Maid Harem o Tsukurimasu!

altTitles.ja: アストロキング　召喚勇者だけど下級認定されたのでメイドハーレムを作ります！

altTitles.ja-ro: Asutoro Kingu - Shoukan Yuusha dakedo Kakyuu Nintei sareta node Meido Haaremu o Tsukurimasu!

altTitles.en: Astro King - Summoned as a Hero, I Turned Out to Be Low Rank, so I Made a Maid Harem!

altTitles.id: Astro King - Di panggil Sebagai Pahlawan, Aku Ternyata Berpangkat Rendah, Jadi Aku Membuat Harem dengan Pelayan!!

description.en: After being transported to another world with all of his classmates, Yoshitsune was ordered to conquer the dungeon as a hero. While his peers were all reeled in and tamed by the offer of unlimited sex with the castle maids, Yoshitsune, a low-rank hero, devoted his cheat skills to getting more and more maid wives...
description.id: Setelah dipindahkan ke dunia lain dengan semua teman sekelasnya, Yoshitsune diperintahkan untuk menaklukkan dungeon sebagai pahlawan.  Sementara rekan-rekannya semua tertarik dan dijinakkan oleh tawaran seks tanpa batas dengan para pelayan kastil, Yoshitsune, seorang pahlawan berpangkat rendah, mengabdikan keterampilan curangnya untuk mendapatkan lebih banyak istri pelayan ...
description.ja: クラスメイト全員と共に異世界召喚された義経は、勇者としてダンジョン攻略を命じられることに。メイドさんとエッチし放題というご褒美に釣られ同級生たちが次々と骨抜きにされる中、下級勇者に任命された義経はチートスキルで嫁メイドを増やすことに専念していき…？
description.pt-br: Depois de ser transportado para outro mundo com todos os seus colegas de classe, Yoshitsune foi ordenado a conquistar a masmorra como um herói.  Enquanto seus colegas eram todos atraídos e domados pela oferta de sexo ilimitado com as empregadas do castelo, Yoshitsune, um herói de baixo escalão, dedicou suas habilidades de trapaça para conseguir mais e mais empregadas domésticas...

description.en:
Fudou Jun is a highschool teacher and takes a trip with a group of students. While there, a group of martial artists staying nearby take a strange interest in the girls.  
These men are actually demons and after changing into their true form break into the cabin to rape the girls. One gets Jun and violates her.  
She feels her soul being torn apart and transforms into Devilman Lady. With newfound powers and strength she kills all the demons and protects the girls from any further harm.  
What are these demons and why did she turn into a hybrid of one? What does this mean for her and for the rest of humanity?
description.pt-br: Fudou Jun é uma professora do colegial que fez uma viagem com um grupo de estudantes. Enquanto estava lá, um grupo de lutadores que estavam nas proximidades desenvolvem um estranho interesse pelas meninas. Esses homens são na verdade demônios e depois de mudar para sua forma verdadeira, eles entram na pousada para estuprar as meninas. Um deles pega Jun para violá-la. Ela sente sua alma dilacerada e se transforma em Devilman Lady. Com poderes e força recém descobertos, ela mata todos os demônios e protege as meninas de qualquer outro dano. O que são esses demônios e por que ela se transformou em um híbrido? O que isso significa para ela e para o resto da humanidade?

title.en: UsoNatsu ~The Summer Romance Bloomed From A Lie~

altTitles.ja-ro: Uso kara Hajimaru Koi no Natsu -squall-

altTitles.es-la: Un verano de amor que comienza con una mentira -squall-

altTitles.en: Summer Love Begins with a Lie -squall-

description.en:
Kaoru, who had run away from home, is found and protected by her main teacher, Mirei, in the rain. At school, the teacher seemed like a responsible adult, but at home, her attitude is careless, drinking alcohol during the day and making jokes with a smile on her face. However, she accepts and understands the worries that Kaoru could not cope with.... Thus begins the faltering romance of two people who cannot yet become adults.

An official manga adapting the visual novel "Uso kara Hajimaru Koi no Natsu" that was not shown in the main story, focusing on the relationship between a teacher and her student, portraying a love story, Youth ✕ Summer ✕ Yuri.
description.es-la:
Kaoru, quien había huido de casa, es encontrada y protegida por su profesora principal, Mirei, bajo la lluvia. En la escuela, la profesora parecía una adulta responsable, pero en casa, su actitud es descuidada, bebe alcohol durante el día y hace bromas con una sonrisa en el rostro. Sin embargo, acepta y comprende las preocupaciones con las que Kaoru no podía enfrentarse... Así comienza el titubeante romance de dos personas que aún no pueden convertirse en adultas.

Un manga oficial que adapta la novela visual "Uso kara Hajimaru Koi no Natsu" que no se mostró en la historia principal, centrándose en la relación entre una profesora y su alumna, retratando una historia de amor, Juventud ✕ Verano ✕ Yuri.

altTitles.ja: ダブルヘリクス ブロッサム

description.en: The manga is set in the near future, and begins with the awakening of police officer Kiku Shinonome, who was put into cryogenic stasis for 60 years to stave off what would have been a fatal wound. In a new world unfamiliar to her, she is forced to team up with Kyo Tsukisagari, a criminal with a big rap sheet but equipped with psychic powers. Together, they solve paranormal incidents, even while their personalities butt up against each other.
description.ja:
2人の少女が織りなすSFバディアクション

警察官である19歳の少女・東雲菊は、とある事件を捜査している最中、大けがを負ってしまう。現代の医療では治療不可能とされた彼女に残された唯一の道は、長き眠りにつく「コールドスリープ」であった・・・。次に彼女の意識が戻ったのは、60年後の日本――！

そこで犯罪を取り締まっているのは、彼女が所属していたかつての警察ではなく、民間の警察組織だった。そうした中、重犯罪者・月下香とバディを組むことに…。長き眠りから覚めた菊と、超能力を使う香。

title.en: Yuusha-sama wa Houshuu ni Hitozuma wo go Kibou desu

altTitles.ja: 勇者さまは報酬に人妻をご希望です

altTitles.ja-ro: Yuusha-sama wa Houshuu ni Hitozuma o go Kiboudesu

altTitles.en: The Hero Wants a Married Woman as a Reward

description.en:
The hero, Chloe, is a strange hero who demands a bounty when saving people. And what makes it different is the prize... He only likes married women, so he demands the prettiest Milf in town.

**"If you want me to save the city, give me your most beautiful married woman!"**

 A unique erotic fantasy story created by a hero!
description.id:
Pahlawan ini keji...!!  Pahlawan, Chloe, adalah pahlawan aneh yang menuntut hadiah saat menyelamatkan orang. Dan yang membuatnya berbeda adalah hadiahnya...Dia hanya senang dengan wanita yang sudah menikah, jadi dia menuntut Milf yang paling cantik di kota. 

"Jika kau ingin aku menyelamatkan kota, berikan aku milf yang paling cantik" 

Sebuah cerita unik fantasi erotis yang dibuat oleh pahlawan!
description.ja: この勇者、下劣ッ…！！勇者・クロエは人々を救う際に報酬を要求する、異質な勇者だった。そして彼が異質なのはその報酬であった…彼は人妻にしか興奮しない為、その町で一番美しい人妻を要求するのであった。「町を救ってほしければ、一番美しい人妻を寄越せ」異色の勇者がおりなすエロファンタジー！

altTitles.ja: 吸血姫【ヴァンパイア】美夕 朔

description.en: A half-human, half-vampire girl named Miyu is trapped in a body that will remain a teenager forever. As a vampire, it is her duty to hunt down demonic beings known as Shinma who have wandered into the human world and send them back to the Darkness. The new story begins with Miyu transferring to a certain middle school.

Daily Chaldea is an unofficial daily slice-of-life fancomic created using art assets from the game Fate/Grand Order and building upon the existing lore of the franchise.

The story follows the adventures of genderswapping protagonist Ritsuka Fujimaru and the many Servants they've summoned, with the tone ranging from comedic to philosophical. The comic is 'live' with the NA server of Fate/Grand Order, with new characters appearing in the comic around the time they appear in the game and comics often referencing recent events in the game.

Enjoyment of this comic relies heavily upon the reader's familiarity with the game and its characters, so the author recommends playing Fate/Grand Order before reading this comic.

---

This comic is being uploaded to MangaDex by reader request and with the approval of MangaDex staff. All art is copyright TYPE-Moon / FGO Project, Aniplex Inc., Lasengle, and other copyright holders as appropriate. This comic is not for profit (through ad revenue or otherwise).

Some early use the original white backgrounds. Later comics have darker backgrounds and additional art assets for improved quality.

title.en: The Snow Leopard Baby of the Black Leopard Family

description.en: A child, born a hybrid and abused to death by their grandfather, is reborn with memories of their past life. Faced with the same fate, they seek out their estranged father for protection until adulthood. Expecting rejection, they are instead met with love and acceptance from their father, siblings, and grandfather—who even offers them the family leadership.

title.en: Kobayashi-san Chi no Maid Dragon Official Guidebook

altTitles.en: Miss Kobayashi's Dragon Maid Official Guidebook

altTitles.ja: 小林さんちのメイドラゴン公式ガイドブック メイドラ大全

description.en:
A complete compendium! This official guidebook tells you everything about "Kobayashi-san Chi no Maid Dragon" (as of now).
Character profiles for humans and dragons / Recap of the story by volume / Dragon matching test / Guardian knowledge test / Collection of gorgeous illustrations by the best guest artists / Q&A with Coolkyoushinja / Drafts for Chapter 1 / Illustration gallery (in full color)... and more!
It also includes a special chapter newly drawn!
A super-supreme must-have for all Dragon Maid fans!!

Sharks don't have lungs, but they do have to breathe oxygen to survive. Instead of breathing air, though, sharks get oxygen from the water that surrounds them. So they have to move around, if they stop moving for a while, they sink into the water and die, So Sharks have to move and move constantly from birth to death. The same goes for you. If you want to survive, keep moving, then you will be the best hunter… like a shark.

altTitles.vi: Dõi Theo Màn Đêm Trong Em

description.en:
Mayo, who is gloomy and lacks self-confidence, is currently active as the bright and cheerful popular VTuber "Mahiru".

The more Mahiru, the polar opposite of his true self, is loved, the more the reality of being alone becomes painful...

Even his manager Ogino, who praises him a lot and spoils him, is probably only looking at Mahiru, not the real "me".

Because he knows this, he can't take Ogino's words "I love you" seriously and wish to be loved by him so much...!

However, as if seeing through Mayo's "desire to be bullied", Ogino asks, "Shall I bully you instead?", revealing the depths of his body trembling with anticipation...!?

A sweet, sadistic, caring manager x an unconsciously masochistic, gloomy VTuber

Development of the mind and body! Pampered Love Days!!!!

altTitles.fr: Le chevalier qui ne vit qu'aujourd'hui

description.en: Is dying repeatedly a blessing? Enkrid's life-long dream of becoming a knight looked to be forever out of reach, until one day he died... and woke up at the beginning of that same day! Now that he has unlimited chances to train and engage in mortal combat, just how far can he go?
description.pt-br: "Você é um gênio." Essas palavras que ele ouviu quando era criança eram veneno. Encrid sonhava em ser um cavaleiro, mas logo percebeu que era fútil. "Quer viver pela espada com esse nível de habilidade?" Uns davam risada dele. "Apenas desista." Outros aconselhavam contra. Mesmo assim, o sonho dele não morreu. Ele dormia menos, corria mais, e se esforçava pra caramba. Um dia, morreu, com uma espada perfurando sua garganta. Encrid abriu os olhos novamente para a "manhã de hoje".

altTitles.ja: 夢見る男子は現実主義者

altTitles.en: The Dreaming Boy is a Realist

altTitles.id: Anak Laki-laki yang Bermimpi adalah Seorang Realis

altTitles.th: เด็กหนุ่มจอมเพ้อฝัน ผู้ตื่นมามองความเป็นจริง

altTitles.zh: 满怀美梦的少年是现实主义者

altTitles.vi: Chàng trai mơ mộng là người theo chủ nghĩa hiện thực

description.en:
Wataru Sajou, who is deeply in love with his beautiful classmate Aika Natsukawa, is continuing to approach her without getting discouraged while having dreams about their mutual love. However one day he woke up thinking, “I am not really fit to be together with someone as good as her, huh…” Upon realizing this, Wataru started keeping an appropriate distance towards her, much to Aika’s surprise. “Could it be that he hates me now…? ”Did his intentions slip by her because she was getting impatient after arriving at the wrong conclusion!? This is the start of a romcom revolving around two people who just cant get their feelings across and both think their love is unrequited!

[Official English Light Novel](https://monogatari-novels.com/collections/the-dreaming-boy-is-a-realist)
description.ja:
同じクラスの美少女・夏川愛華に恋い焦がれる男子高校生・佐城渉。両想いを夢見て日々アプローチを続けていたが、ある日突然その“夢”から醒めてしまう。

「愛華のような完璧美少女が俺と釣り合うわけないだろ……」

突然よそよそしくなった渉。すると今度は愛華が動揺し始めて……!?
description.pt-br: Sajou Wataru está apaixonado por sua colega de classe Natsukawa Aika, a ponto de ele sonhar acordado sobre o amor mútuo e relacionamento deles, aproximando-se dela implacavelmente em todas as oportunidades. No entanto, um dia, Wataru fica sóbrio e tem que enfrentar a realidade. “De jeito nenhum eu seria bom suficiente para uma flor inatingível como ela, certo?” Depois de começar a ver a realidade como ela era, Wataru passou a manter uma certa distância de Aika, o que a deixou em um turbilhão. “Ele... me odeia agora?” Por causa desse mal-entendido, são despertados sentimentos subconscientes que vêm e vão!? Assim começa a confusão de sentimentos unilaterais mútuos, atormentados por mal-entendidos.

description.en:
The Fierce Demons pride themselves as being the reigning delinquent gang of Mikado High School, but their name lets on much more, as they are being influenced by strange occult forces.
Dan Hayato, a mysterious transfer student with an unknown past, arrives at the school with a hidden agenda. With his power to separate his soul from his body, what does he know about the motives of the Fierce Demons and what events will lead to the destruction of the school?
description.ja: 帝高校夜間部のアイドル、氷河めぐみが、謎の老婆ミス・ヴァージン率いる黒門高校によって拉致された！彼女を救うために教師が招いたのは、檀隼人という謎の転校生。めぐみ奪還に動き出す隼人だったが、その役目は我らにこそあり、と帝高護衛団「烈鬼」も動き出す。果たして彼女を救いだすのは――？

title.en: Touhou - Ladies of Scarlet Devil Mansion

description.en: A light-hearted comedy centered on the residents of the Scarlet Devil Mansion. Unofficial and non-canon. Published monthly in the web edition of Strange Creators of Outer World.

An orphan named Raul was taken in by the vampire Rose. Raul worked hard for Rose's sake, and as a result, he became incredibly muscular. This is the story of Raul, now buff and strong, and Rose, the eternally youthful vampire, enjoying their fun daily life together!

[Shogakukan](https://csbs.shogakukan.co.jp/book?book_group_id=18823)

altTitles.ja: ちがう宮原おまえじゃない！

altTitles.zh: 我要找的、才不是宫原你啦！

description.en:
The manga centers on Arima, a boy who has a crush on a girl named Yukihira. But every time he tries to make a move to get closer to Yukihira, his other friend Miyahara just happens to be in the scene and will always mistakenly think that Arima is making a move on her. ([ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2022-11-11/midori-obiya-launches-new-manga-mini-series/.191780))
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [Young Jump!](https://ynjn.jp/title/7831)
description.ja: 憧れの女子”雪比良さん”と仲良くなるべく奮闘する有馬！ でもなぜか、いつもイイところであらわれるのは…。 末永〜く見守りたい！中学生３人の青春ラブコメ、ここに開幕っ！
description.vi: Câu chuyện diễn biến xung quanh Arima - một cậu bạn sơ trung phải lòng một bạn nữ cùng lớp tên Yukihira. Nhưng mỗi khi cậu ấy chuẩn bị tiến gần hơn với Yukihara thì cô bạn thuở nhỏ Miyahara lại bất chợt xuất hiện lúc nào chẳng hay làm cho mọi người lầm tưởng rằng Arima đang nhắm đến cô bạn đó hơn là Yukihara.
description.pt-br: Arima, é um garoto apaixonado por uma garota chamada Yukihira. Mas toda vez que ele tenta ficar mais próximo de Yukihira, sua outra amiga, Miyahara simplesmente entra em cena e sempre pensa erroneamente que Arima está fazendo seus movimentos por ela.

title.en: Reikoku Koutei wa Hitojichi Oujo wo Dekiai-chuu

altTitles.ja: 冷酷皇帝は人質王女を溺愛中　なぜかぬいぐるみになって抱かれています

altTitles.ja-ro: Reikoku Koutei wa Hitojichi Oujo wo Dekiai-chuu

altTitles.en: The Ruthless Emperor Is Doting on the Hostage Princess

description.en:
A heartwarming fantasy that is sure to heal!

Ferlina is married to the ruthless Emperor Valt as a hostage for peace.
However, an incident causes him to be possessed by an adorable stuffed animal!
And when his appearance is revealed to the emperor, she finds herself in a desperate situation... or so she thought.
description.ja:
癒され必至のハートフル・ファンタジー!

和平のための人質として冷酷皇帝ヴァルトに嫁いだフェルリナ。
だが、ある事件をきっかけになんと可愛らしい"ぬいぐるみ"に憑依してしまう!
そして、その姿が皇帝にバレてしまい絶体絶命の大ピンチ――かと思いきや…?

目が覚めるとぬいぐるみの姿に!?
癒され必至のハートフル・ファンタジー!

title.en: Love Advice from the Great Duke of Hell

altTitles.fa: مشاوره‌های عشقی از اربابِ بزرگِ دوزخ

altTitles.uk: Любовні поради від величного герцоґа Пекла

altTitles.pl: Miłosne Porady od Wielkiego Księcia Piekieł

description.en: The girl of your dreams barely knows you exist. Your friends can’t help. Your family is clueless. So where do you turn for love advice? Who can provide you with that essential assistance for the lovelorn? If you’re average everyday teenager Paul, you summon a powerful demon from deep in the recesses of Hell and frankly, hope for the best.
description.fa: دختر رویاهات روحشم خبر نداره که تو وجود داری. هیچ کمکی هم از دست دوستات بر نمیاد. خونواده‌ت هم از این قضیه خبر ندارن. خب حالا برای مشاوره گرفتن به کی رو می‌زنی؟ کی می‌تونه تورو که یه عاشق دل‌خسته‌ای، اساسی کمک کنه تا برای همه‌چیز آماده باشی؟ اگه یه نوجوون معمولی مثل پال باشی، یه شیطان گولاخ از اعماق دخمه‌های جهنم احضار می‌کنی و جدی جدی امیدواری که همه‌چی درست پیش بره!
description.fr: Un étrange étudiant invoque un puissant démon. Que peut-il bien vouloir ?
description.it:
La ragazza dei tuoi sogni a stento sa che esisti, gli amici non ti possono aiutare, la famiglia non ne sa nulla. Ma allora, dove cercare consigli d'amore? Chi può provvedere a darti quell'assistenza essenziale per il tuo cuore? Se sei il ragazzo della porta accanto, Paul, allora ti basta evocare un potente demone dai più profondi abissi dell'Inferno e, francamente, sperare per il meglio.  


---

**Links:**  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/unfins)  
- [Author's Patreon](https://www.patreon.com/unfins)

altTitles.ja: ごきげんよう、一局いかが？

altTitles.en: Good day to you, how about a game?

description.en: At a prestigious girls' school, Sae, a shy high schooler didn't fit in with her classmates. Her daily routine during lunch break consists of playing her Mahjong game on her phone. Due to her hobby being maybe too old-fashioned, she kept it a secret, until she was found out by her class' charismatic rich lady, Chise! Will they with their diametrically different personalities get along through playing Mahjong...?

altTitles.en: Three Sisters in Love with You

description.en: In the world of daily full-throttle dedication to his studies, there's Itsuki, a high school boy. The reason he's putting in so much effort into his studies is to reunite with his first love, a girl named Amane, and go on a date with her. While he's immersed in these study-centric days, by a twist of fate, he ends up living together with Amane and her sisters, Shion and Mone...!?
description.ja: 勉学に日々全力投球の男子高校生・樹。勉強を頑張る理由は、初恋の女性・天音と再会し、デートをするためである。そんな勉強一色の日々を過ごす中、天音とその姉妹の詩音・萌音とひょんなことから同居することになり…!?

description.pl: To miłość od pierwszego wejrzenia dla Karela, kiedy podczas podróży widzi zaniedbanego, ale pięknego Sasyę. Chociaż Karel oferuje mu jedzenie i zakwaterowanie, Sasya wymyka się, nie pozostawiając żadnych wskazówek co do swojej tożsamości. Los jednak zbliża ich do siebie, gdy Karel znajduje zdjęcie Sasyi w domu rosyjskiego księcia i odnajduje go w Paryżu. Kiedy dowiaduje się, że Sasya jest utalentowanym baletnikiem, który uciekł z Rosji w trudnych okolicznościach, Karel przygarnia go z pomocą swojego bogatego przyjaciela, Juliana. Jednak Sasya wie, że oferta sponsoringu Juliana jest ważna tylko tak długo, jak długo Karel będzie nim zainteresowany...

description.en: Kouta Takeda is a young office worker, who at the entry level at XOX Corporation is put under the direct supervision of Kyouko Takizawa, a stunning and voluptuous woman with a fearsome reputation at the company as an inflexible and cruel boss, but Takeda has the privilege of finding out that Takizawa is no iron lady, and that she's no stranger to kindness where it's dispensed.
description.ja: こんな上司と働きたい♪　Twitter発、美人で巨乳な女上司4コマ！ 新卒で入った僕の会社の上司・滝沢さんは、美人で巨乳でちょっぴり○○！？　Twitterで話題になった後ニコニコ静画にて連載化された美人女上司さん4コマがたわわに書籍化!!
description.pt:
Kouta Takeda, que acabou de começar a trabalhar na XOX Corporation, conhece sua nova chefe, uma linda mulher de seios grandes chamada Kyouko Takizawa.  
  
**Links:**  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/yan_baru55)
description.pt-br: Kouta Takeda, que acabou de começar a trabalhar na XOX Corporation, conhece sua nova chefe, uma linda mulher de seios grandes chamada Kyouko Takizawa.

title.en: Gakeppuchi Reijou wa Kurokishi-sama o Horesasetai!

altTitles.ja: 崖っぷち令嬢は黒騎士様を惚れさせたい!

altTitles.ja-ro: Gakeppuchi Reijou wa Kurokishi-sama wo Horesasetai!

altTitles.es-la: ¡Quiero hacer que el Caballero Oscuro se Enamore de mi!

altTitles.en: I Want to Make Black-Knight Fall In Love With Me!

altTitles.pl: Chcę, żeby Czarny Rycerz Się We Mnie Zakochał

altTitles.en: A Noblewoman on the Brink of Disaster Wants to Make the Black Knight Fall in Love!

description.en: My family is in debt, and we don't have enough money for my sick sister's treatment... The troubled noble, Clarice, finds herself engaged in a political marriage with the most feared Black-Knight in the kingdom, Frost, known for "slaughtering beasts with his bare hands". In an attempt to secure the fortune, Clarice tries to seduce the "Black-Knight", but just as she does, she discovers "her" secret...
description.ja: 実家は借金まみれ、病気の妹を救うには治療費が足りない…。崖っぷちな子爵令嬢・クラリスが政略結婚をすることになったのは、「魔物を素手で屠る」とウワサの黒騎士・フロストだった！財産を握るため、どうにか”黒騎士様”を篭絡しようとした矢先、クラリスは“彼女”の秘密を知ってしまい…。
description.pl:
Moja rodzina jest zadłużona i nie mamy pieniędzy na leczenie chorej siostry...
Zmartwiona szlachcianka, Clarice, zostaje zaangażowana w polityczne małżeństwo z najbardziej przerażającym Czarnym Rycerzem w królestwie, Frostem, znanym z „zabijania bestii gołymi rękami”.
Chcąc zapewnić sobie fortunę, Clarice próbuje uwieść „Czarnego Rycerza”, ale gdy to robi, odkrywa „jej” sekret...
description.es-la:
Mi familia está endeudada, y no tenemos suficiente dinero para el tratamiento de mi hermana enferma...
La nobleza en apuros, Clarice, se encuentra comprometida en un matrimonio político con el Caballero Oscuro más temido del reino, Frost, quien es conocido por "matar bestias con sus propias manos"
Con la intención de asegurar la fortuna, Clarice intenta seducir al "Caballero Oscuro", pero justo cuando lo hace, descubre el secreto de "ella"...

altTitles.ja-ro: Toaru Majutsu no Index Gaiden: Toaru Kagaku no Railgun

altTitles.es: Un cierto cañón de riel científico

altTitles.th: เรลกัน แฟ้มลับคดีวิทยาศาสตร์

altTitles.ja: とある科学の超電磁砲
とある魔術の禁書目録外伝 とある科学の超電磁砲

description.en:
Welcome to a world where mysticism and science collide, and supernatural powers are derived from either science or religion. At the heart of this world is Academy City, an advanced metropolis whose population is comprised mostly of students The majority of students are enrolled in the city's "Power Curriculum Program," where they must learn to master their latent psychic powers. Out of several million students, only seven are deemed powerful enough to have Level 5 status.

Meet Mikoto Misaka, the third most powerful Level 5 ESPer in Academy City. Together with her best friends Kuroko Shirai and the other members of Judgment, a student-run law enforcement agency, Mikoto delves deep into the dark heart of the scientific sprawl she calls home, and uncovers secrets she wishes she hadn't!
description.ru:
Где-то на островах Южной Японии раскинулся Академия Сити - город, большинство жителей которого учатся и работают в школах юных эсперов. Обладатели паранормальных способностей в поте лица трудятся, чтобы познать свой дар и поднять владение им на новую высоту. Гордость школы Токивадай и всего города? Мисака Микото – третья по силе среди известных миру эсперов высшего уровня. У «Электрической принцессы» много полезных умений, одно из которых – ручной рейлган, то есть возможность своими электромагнитными способностями разогнать монетку где-то до трех Махов (на другом конце траектории стоять не рекомендуется). Но всех усилий Микото пока не хватает для решения двух насущных задач: отбиться от юрийных домогательств своей подруги Сирай Куроко и разобраться с наглым парнем по имени Камидзё Тома!


---
